experience.title: Haptic Virtual Reality & Simulation
experience.description:
Development of a virtual ride application connected to a bike simulator using the Google Maps API.

Development of a virtual world and game mechanics on Unreal Engine 5 allowing to use the connected bike to interact with the environment.

experience.title: Treasurer for the student association Japan Horizon
experience.description: Student association promoting Japanese culture through many events. Also organizes work experience in Japan. Management of accounts for the association. Research of partnerships, organization of events for the association. Management of the administration for the sending of students in internship in Japan.

experience.title: Waiter in a japanese hotel
experience.description: Internship as a waiter in a fully Japanese environment in the kumanoyu Hotel to improve my language skills and discover the culture.

experience.title: French for french as a foreign Language (FLE)
experience.description: Teaching French to people in difficulty in order to help them in their professional integration.
